timeline.message:
:art: updated layers view package names to match convention
:art: updated layers view module source to java 11
:art: removed unused dependencies from layers view module
:art: added icon for layers view
:art: updated layers view attributes to make them more interpretable
:art: moved LayerAction enum to its own class to avoid access warnings
:art: updated LayersViewPane with an add layer button
:art: added finalsand other minor code improvements

timeline.bodyText: This would have been because this work started whilst we were still on Java 8. Greatly appreciate your review @cygnus-x-1 ❤️
timeline.author: arcturus2

timeline.bodyText: A load of these updates were caused by that issue I had with the module renaming. I'm just not sure what went wrong.
timeline.author: aldebaran30701

timeline.bodyText: This was something I manually changed to hopefully rectify the renaming issue.
